description: A short loop to the top of a small hill which provides some decent views of Powderface Ridge and Elbow Valley.Elevation gain is only 200 meters.
directions: Park at Forgetmenot Pond day use area new Little Elbow Recreation area.Cross the road pass through the cattle fence, turn right follow trail on winding climb through pine forest.There is a faint trail to summit from a junction near the top.
title: Ford Knoll Loop
